alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:17PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern San Juan County through 700 PM MDT... At 617 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canyonlands National Park, or 27 miles southwest of Moab, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyonlands National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
